name: Word Game (itch) (Fortstudios)
description:
A simple test build of a word based game, inspired by wordle but not a wordle clone, the aim of the game is to find the word. To do this you need to choose if the next letter in the word is the same as the current one or if it is higher or lower in the alphabet than the currently shown letter.

You have five lives per word which get reset when you complete the word, with 4 different difficulties of words, there are more five letter words than the others as I planned this to only use five letter words but added the others for people who wanted to try harder words.

This game only took me a day to create but I wanted to make it so I had the code in case I want to build upon this game with extra features or incorporate this style puzzle into another game I am making. Like the picross game, this is not completed but part of a group of smaller games I am creating to see how they are coded while I work on bigger projects.

If you play and enjoy this, make sure to follow to try out other puzzle games that I make and upload.

Donations are not necessary to play this or any of my other games currently, but if you do donate any money it will go into improving equipment, making more games and improving current games. Thank you for checking out my game.
